extendedInfo.description: Your Christmas List or Santa's ListFeatures include:-Gift Tracking by Person-Gift Cost Tracking-Cost SummaryUpgrading to the Pro version adds:-No more annoying Ads-Password protection optionsSee website or help screen for upgrade instructions*Permissions are for Ads, Download Pro version to remove them.

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Love this app its simple to use I used it last year so I had to get it this year
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Super-helpful app (especially since it\'s free!) with fun graphics and friendly UI. Adorable icon too! Great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This app is great! I love the little graphics and the UI. It\'s super easy. And now I don\'t have to worry about the older kids finding my list ;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s ok. Could be better.
reviews.comment: It\'s a lot of entering info in. I really prefer Amazon\'s wish list because I can link items with direct links to where to purchase them. And it\'s available to me on my phone and to others online or on their phone. So, for gift/wish list tracking I will keep using Amazon. I was looking for something that would add the $ spent on each person in my list, but this one just lists the amount of the gift in each individual item from the info I enter. Not really what I was looking for. And having to do all the typing of the items and having no link to them... meh. Not ideal for for.
reviews.author: Nicole Harris

reviews.comment: Great app! Some useful features would be 1) check off a person when you are done shopping for them and 2) a master list of what is left to buy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good, simple app. Wish there was an option to sort list other than the default by alpha & also wish I can check off completed gift recipients
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very handy.
reviews.comment: I used this for Christmas 2011. It is great for tracking expenses, jotting down gift ideas and tracking people. IDEAS TO IMPROVE--add a way to track if you have wrapped the gifts; and maybe a way to see a shopping list of unpurchased presents so you can quickly scan what you need to buy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is the best app I have installed on my phone. It has made Christmas shopping for my seven kids so much easier this year. Thank you!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t open
reviews.comment: I downloaded multiple times. After I agree to the terms, screen stays black, then crashes. App doesn\'t work on my Galaxy S3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s ok
reviews.comment: For some reason I can only scroll through the data  fields when my phone is in the landscape position.  If I hold my phone in the portrait position I can\'t scroll down to save the info.  Then when I switch to landscape position in the middle of entering data it is all lost and takes me back to the main screen.  The app also tells the total of all gifts on the list and the total of all unpurchased gifts but I don\'t see the total of what has been purchased, which is far more important.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Brilliant easy and quick to use. Nice pictures. Great that list can be emailed. Only wish the birthday app was this good too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Second year using app, and it really helped organize my shopping and saved a ton of time.  No more starting paper lists and losing them!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I used this app Christmas \'10, it does what it says it does. No problems, works smoothly. Will use again this year!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sure beats a paper list!
reviews.comment: This is marvelous for helping to track how much I\'ve spent on each child. Just seeing it helps me to control costs! I\'m really liking this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This program is amazing. Its simple to use and has helped me keep up with everything perfectly. The best part is that it tracks spending!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: I love this app and used it last year also. It would be super awesome if under adding a gift idea there maybe was a barcode scanner to automatically add something you see while out shopping. If that was possible this app would be amazing!
reviews.author: ashley blow

reviews.comment: Love it! Sometimes the gift count on how many you have bought and have left to buy is off. Other than that its awesome!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is great. With a large family it allows me to keep up with all of my purchases for each person. Don\'t know what I did before this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment: Why would you or any of the 3 rd party vendors need to track my location... it just an x-mas list guys... get real.. deleted this garbage app!!\"!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FANTASIC
reviews.comment: My kids do this year around and a mother at 25 with y kids all very nuts LOVE this app  I recamend this to kids and adults to use this app Love,maggie
reviews.author: A Google User
